data.title: Upar Vala Dukhiyo Ki Nahi Sunata Re
meta_keywords: Upar Vala Dukhiyo Ki Nahi Sunata Re
ऊपर वाला दुखियों की नाहीं सुनता रे
data.meta_description: Upar Vala Dukhiyo Ki Nahi Sunata Re ;  Singer: Dilip Kumar, Kishore Kumar ; Movie: Sagina (1974) ; Actor: Dilip Kumar, Saira Banu, Om Prakash, Aparna Sen, Anil Chatterjee ; Music Director: Sachin Dev Burman ; Lyricist: Majrooh Sultanpuri
data.text:
Ajay Ojha on Monday, October 11, 2010

Awesome song. I am from Ballia, UP and somehow this song and the other song

from Sagina Mahto resonate with me. Md Rafi usually sang for Dilip Kumar

but here Kishore Kumar's voice suits him so well.

AshwaniKumar Mishra on Sunday, September 11, 2011

@ajojha Yes Mr .Ojha.. This is called the Great "Kishore Kumar" I felt

Dilip kumar struggle many times in the song :) not able to justice

fully.But overall dilip kumar was good

Jack z on Saturday, October 19, 2013

This was a great experiment which went off well. The genius of Kishore and

Dilip combined. Maybe only for this film.

Arun Kaul on Wednesday, August 27, 2014

A small gesture of Dalip ji used to tell the whole story...what a

performer...

Moti Lalwani on Wednesday, May 30, 2012

Kishore Kumar's voice suits Dilip Kumar, for which the credit goes to

Sachinda.
